title: BREAKING: Texas House passes hemp expansion bill

scenes.visual_description: Character facing camera, confident expression, Texas background with warm sunset tones
Product showcase with spotlight effect, 'Wall of Weed' background, clean professional display
Split screen: product on left, benefits list on right, character presenting with enthusiasm
Lt. Dan with clipboard, checklist graphics, green checkmarks, official Texas seal visible
Character direct to camera, 'Stay TOONED' text overlay, social media handles, subscribe button

characters.name: Dro (Hydro)
catchphrases: The best in Texas, believe me

dialogue.line: Welcome back to the tremendous Texas Hemp story, that I can tell you. Today we're talking about Legislative Win.
Let me show you the most magnificent product we've ever created. Nobody does it better than us, folks.
The benefits are magnificent - absolutely, these products are changing lives across Texas.
Every single product is tested, verified, and 100% compliant with Texas law. By the book, that I can tell you.
Stay TOONED for more Texas cannabis truth. Subscribe, share, and let's make Texas the #1 hemp state in America. they know it!

advocacy_message: Third-party lab testing ensures every product meets Texas DSHS standards. By the book.

viral_hooks.opening: The Texas hemp industry just went NUCLEAR...
viral_hooks.closing: ...the revolution will be televised, folks. Don't miss it.
quotable_lines: "Texas hemp is beautiful - the best in Texas, believe me."
"≤0.3% THC, 100% legal, 1000% Texas. That's compliance, folks."
"They said it couldn't be done. We did it anyway. That's the Texas way."
"From seed to sale, every step is beautiful. No shortcuts, no compromises."
"The cannabis revolution is here, and Texas is leading the charge."

current_event_tie_in.hook: Texas House passes hemp expansion bill
current_event_tie_in.angle: Political momentum, bipartisan support, freedom wins
